title: Musicician Doc 'Swamp Dogg Gets His Pool Painted' Official Trailer
description: "This is just a dream, but again, it could be reality." Magnolia Pictures has revealed an official trailer for a peculiar documentary film titled Swamp Dogg Gets His Pool Painted, arriving to watch in theaters this May. Yes indeed it's about "the soul genius time forgot" aka Swamp Dogg and his home in Los Angeles. This premiered at last year's SXSW Film Festival with reviews saying it's as vibey all the music he has produced over the years. Cult musician Swamp Dogg and his housemates Moogstar & Guitar Shorty turned their Los Angeles home into an artistic haven. Together they travel through the music biz, forming a friendship transcending eras. Hidden away, deep in the suburbs, the legendary Swamp Dogg, alongside his two friends, have transformed their home into an artistic playground. They discuss the music industry and their lives dwelling in this suburban sanctuary. Featuring Swamp Dogg (aka Jerry Williams Jr.), with Alonzo Williams, Moogstar, Tom Kenny, Mike Judge, Dr. Jeri Williams, Johnny Knoxville, Naeem Juwan, & John Prine. This looks most fascinating as a time capsule doc featuring stories about music & how its changed over the years. Here's the official trailer for Gale & Olson's doc Swamp [â€¦]
author: Alex Billington
excerpt: "This is just a dream, but again, it could be reality." Magnolia Pictures has revealed an official trailer for a peculiar documentary film titled Swamp Dogg Gets His Pool Painted, arriving to watch in theaters this May. Yes indeed it's about "the soul genius time forgot" aka Swamp Dogg and his home in Los Angeles.
text: by April 7, 2025Source: YouTube "This is just a dream, but again, it could be reality." Magnolia Pictures has revealed an official trailer for a peculiar documentary film titled Swamp Dogg Gets His Pool Painted, arriving to watch in theaters this May. Yes indeed it's about "the soul genius time forgot" aka Swamp Dogg and his home in Los Angeles. This premiered at last year's SXSW Film Festival with reviews saying it's as vibey all the music he has produced over the years. Cult musician Swamp Dogg and his housemates Moogstar & Guitar Shorty turned their Los Angeles home into an artistic haven. Together they travel through the music biz, forming a friendship transcending eras. Hidden away, deep in the suburbs, the legendary Swamp Dogg, alongside his two friends, have transformed their home into an artistic playground. They discuss the music industry and their lives dwelling in this suburban sanctuary. Featuring Swamp Dogg (aka Jerry Williams Jr.), with Alonzo Williams, Moogstar, Tom Kenny, Mike Judge, Dr. Jeri Williams, Johnny Knoxville, Naeem Juwan, & John Prine. This looks most fascinating as a time capsule doc featuring stories about music & how its changed over the years. Here's the official trailer for Gale & Olson's doc Swamp Dogg Gets His Pool Painted, from YouTube: Legendary musician Swamp Dogg has been described as "one of the great cult figures of 20th century American music" & "the soul genius time forgot." He's a genuine eccentric responsible for some of the most unique rock-influenced R&B (and wildest album covers) ever made. Hidden away deep in suburban Los Angeles, Swamp Dogg, alongside housemates Moogstar & Guitar Shorty, transformed his home into an artistic playground. Together, they navigate the many tumultuous waves of the music industry, forging a wonderfully bizarre and inspiring path across time & space. Amazing access to Swamp Dogg, along with incredible archival material, creates a fun, hilarious, unconventional film for a perfectly unconventional life. Swamp Dogg Gets His Pool Painted is a doc film directed by indie filmmakers / musicians Isaac Gale and Ryan Olson, both making their feature directorial debut with this. Co-directed by David McMurry. It's produced by Paul Lovelace, David McMurry, Ben Wu, Isaac Gale & Ryan Olson. This initially premiered at the 2024 SXSW Film Festival last year, and it also play at Hot Docs in Toronto. Magnolia Pictures will debut Swamp Dogg Gets His Pool Painted in select US theaters starting May 2nd, 2025 coming soon. Intrigued? Find more posts in: Comedy, Documentaries, To Watch, Trailer
html:
by
April 7, 2025
Source: YouTube

"This is just a dream, but again, it could be reality." Magnolia Pictures has revealed an official trailer for a peculiar documentary film titled Swamp Dogg Gets His Pool Painted, arriving to watch in theaters this May. Yes indeed it's about "the soul genius time forgot" aka Swamp Dogg and his home in Los Angeles. This premiered at last year's SXSW Film Festival with reviews saying it's as vibey all the music he has produced over the years. Cult musician Swamp Dogg and his housemates Moogstar & Guitar Shorty turned their Los Angeles home into an artistic haven. Together they travel through the music biz, forming a friendship transcending eras. Hidden away, deep in the suburbs, the legendary Swamp Dogg, alongside his two friends, have transformed their home into an artistic playground. They discuss the music industry and their lives dwelling in this suburban sanctuary. Featuring Swamp Dogg (aka Jerry Williams Jr.), with Alonzo Williams, Moogstar, Tom Kenny, Mike Judge, Dr. Jeri Williams, Johnny Knoxville, Naeem Juwan, & John Prine. This looks most fascinating as a time capsule doc featuring stories about music & how its changed over the years.

Here's the official trailer for Gale & Olson's doc Swamp Dogg Gets His Pool Painted, from YouTube:

Legendary musician Swamp Dogg has been described as "one of the great cult figures of 20th century American music" & "the soul genius time forgot." He's a genuine eccentric responsible for some of the most unique rock-influenced R&B (and wildest album covers) ever made. Hidden away deep in suburban Los Angeles, Swamp Dogg, alongside housemates Moogstar & Guitar Shorty, transformed his home into an artistic playground. Together, they navigate the many tumultuous waves of the music industry, forging a wonderfully bizarre and inspiring path across time & space. Amazing access to Swamp Dogg, along with incredible archival material, creates a fun, hilarious, unconventional film for a perfectly unconventional life. Swamp Dogg Gets His Pool Painted is a doc film directed by indie filmmakers / musicians Isaac Gale and Ryan Olson, both making their feature directorial debut with this. Co-directed by David McMurry. It's produced by Paul Lovelace, David McMurry, Ben Wu, Isaac Gale & Ryan Olson. This initially premiered at the 2024 SXSW Film Festival last year, and it also play at Hot Docs in Toronto. Magnolia Pictures will debut Swamp Dogg Gets His Pool Painted in select US theaters starting May 2nd, 2025 coming soon. Intrigued?

Find more posts in: Comedy, Documentaries, To Watch, Trailer
